Translations.Text: Alif Lam Ra Those are the Signs of the Clear Book
We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur´an so that hopefully you will use your intellect
We tell you the best of stories in revealing this Qur´an to you, even though you were unaware of it before it came
When Yusuf told his father, ´Father! I saw eleven bright stars, and the sun and moon as well. I saw them all prostrate in front of me.´
He said, ´My son, don´t tell your brothers your dream lest they devise some scheme to injure you, Shaytan is a clear-cut enemy to man

Accordingly your Lord will pick you out and teach you the true meaning of events and perfectly fulfil His blessing on you as well as on the family of Ya´qub as He fulfilled it perfectly before upon your forebears, Ibrahim and Ishaq. Most certainly your Lord is Knowing, Wise.´
